title: David Rescues His Family
summary: David finds Ziklag burned and his people captured by Amalekites. He seeks Godâ€™s guidance, pursues the raiders, and rescues everyone. He also shares the plunder generously with those who stayed behind.

faq.question: What happened to Ziklag while David was gone?
faq.answer: Amalekites raided it, burning the town and taking captives.

faq.question: How did David respond?
faq.answer: He strengthened himself in the Lord, pursued the raiders, and recovered everything.
